transcript: success is the only Revenge as you expand they shrink into irrelevance as you get louder no one can hear them you don't beat them you cast a shadow so big no one can see them to begin with because at the end of the day there's no greater waste of time than justifying your actions to people who have a life that you don't want and there's no amount of pain you can inflict on a hater that will be more painful than their own life
